title: What life will be after 100 years from now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ask a futurist. They will likely talk about the technological singularity, which is a belief that technology, and its affect on people, is progressing so quickly (and continuing to accelerate) that no one can really say with any degree of certainty what things will be like even 30-40 years from now, let alone 100. For example, look at the affect of the computer in the last 50 years. What happens when a true AI is created, or a working fusion power solution? Ever watch TED talks? Lots of ideas on the horizon, some exciting, some concerning.
